entry.title: A Little Bit info Of History About Insurance in America
entry.summary: It was one among the founding fathers, Franklin , who formed the primary insurance firm in 1751, called Philadelphia Contributionship, and it had been home/fire insurance. consistent with PBS reports, 143 policies were issued by the corporate within the first year, and none of…
entry.content:
It was one among the founding fathers, Franklin , who formed the primary insurance firm in 1751, called Philadelphia Contributionship, and it had been home/fire insurance. consistent with PBS reports, 143 policies were issued by the corporate within the first year, and none of the insured property caught fire for seven years afterwards. In fact, Philadelphia used an equivalent scheme that each one insurance companies use today; the members of the corporate paid an amount of cash that might be wont to restore loss thanks to fire-related causes. Such payment is popularly known today as premium . Franklin played a big role in developing insurance indeed, but he wasn't the primary to introduce auto insurance. As a matter of fact, the primary car insurer's venture began a touch before Benjamin Franklin's time.

The First Known Automotive Insurance in America

People now see automobile insurance as an inevitable a part of everyday lives just because car is that the most-popular means of transportation within the country. Insurer provides essential financial protection for each vehicle owner within the event of an accident that causes property damages, casualties, medical conditions, and every one possible financial losses. In America, Detroit is nowadays well-known for its automobile industries. During the late nineteenth to early twentieth century, Ohio was home for innovators of this new sort of transportation. it's worth mentioning that the world's first automobile insurance coverage policy was issued in Dayton, Ohio in 1987. consistent with Ohio Historical Society, Gilbert J. Loomis was the primary person to get car auto insurance . The policy provided protection for Loomis in terms of monetary loss (or financial responsibility) just in case his car damaged another person's properties, killed, or injured someone. These policies are more or less almost like those used widely by modern automobile insurance companies throughout America nowadays; a minimum of , the policies issued to Loomis set samples of what quite financial protection that automobile insurance policy should a minimum of provide for the owner.

read: What does life insurance do for a car loan

The automobile insurance industry slowly began to realize its popularity since then, and it indeed developed into more comprehensive also . In 1902, the primary comprehensive policy provided coverage for fire and theft, so it had been not for accident-related causes only, consistent with International Risk Management Institute. In 1912, coverage that combined multiple perils was beginning to develop as insurers tried to incorporate fire, property, and liability coverage for automobile into one single policy. Auto coverage policies evolved greatly, but the essential principles remain an equivalent . Franklin didn't probably believe cars when he started Philadelphia Contribution-ship, but he played an important role in developing the system and popularize the thought that insurance does bring peace of mind to the policyholder.
With the increase of the car industry in America, insurance also began its expansion. There are many factors involved within the success story of car manufacturing like expansion of U.S. economy, infrastructure and road development, and therefore the rise of "car culture" itself within the country. Of course, the rapid climb of auto production and number of car owners within the country inevitably resulted in additional road cars and accidents.

In 1930, quite 100 people were killed in accidents per day. it's not a surprising fact since drivers at that point weren't obliged to undergo strict driver licensing, and doubtless most of them were never registered to any driver test. This was, in fact, an expected consequence thanks to the absence of driver test or driving schools. In 1920s, thanks to various political reactions, the govt invested more funds to create better roads and control system also as improve vehicle licensing regulation and implement strict driver test. Massachusetts was a step before most states by establishing driver licensing in 1903; however, the state only began to implement driver licensing in 1952.

read: How does health insurance work

Massachusetts and Connecticut were ahead again with the implementation of compulsory insurance and financial responsibility laws. To be more precise, Connecticut's law required driver or vehicle owner to supply valid proof of monetary responsibility of a minimum of $10,000 just in case one is involved in an accident that resulted in additional than $100 worth of damages, injury, medical bills, or when the accident caused the death. Back then, drivers were obliged to what was stated by the law after their first-time accident.

In 1950s, automobile insurance began to spread widely across the state in most states. Massachusetts was the sole states within the country that required drivers to get automobile insurance policy before vehicle registration. In 1956, ny adopted an equivalent regulation; North Carolina took an equivalent step within the following year. During 1960s and 1970s, most states developed an equivalent sort of regulation although each state has different specific requirements. Considering that the start of compulsory insurance law was in 1925, and it had been successfully applied throughout the state by 1970s, the event is staggeringly quick.

Nowadays, automobile insurance [http://carinsuranceestimate.org] evolved into one among the most-profitable industries within the world because of the many help from the web .

entry.title: What does life insurance do for a car loan
entry.summary: As Car loans are one of the most popular types of loans. However, when completing such a procedure, in addition to standard banking requirements, some conditions must be met. One…
entry.content:
As Car loans are one of the most popular types of loans. However, when completing such a procedure, in addition to standard banking requirements, some conditions must be met. One of them is car insurance, the second is life and health insurance with a car loan. This is an additional requirement of banks to provide guarantees of timely repayment of all debts under any circumstances, even if the lender has serious health problems.

This trend is becoming more widespread in banking practice. According to law, life insurance when buying a vehicle in installments is not a prerequisite. However, in reality, getting a car loan without life insurance is becoming more and more difficult.

What is the difference between this type of insurance and traditional insurance? In this case, the insurance contract is drawn up once for the entire duration of the credit contract. It does not need to be renewed once a year until the car loan is paid off.

What does life insurance do for a car loan?

  • The right to fully or partially repay the debt under the loan agreement in the event of unforeseen health situations (complete or partial disability or death of the client);
  • Protection of the material interests of not only the insured person, but also close relatives (especially if the borrowed person is the only breadwinner in the family);
  • In the event of early repayment of the loan debt, the life insurance policy continues for the period for which it was concluded.

Life insurance increases the likelihood that a financial institution will issue a loan. In some banks, the absence of such a policy from a potential client is a reason for refusing to issue a loan, because working with problem debts significantly reduces the bank's profit. In this case, the credit manager has every right not to sign the client's application, without even explaining the reasons for the negative answer.

Life insurance is the confidence that the client will return the funds in full and within the period specified in the contract. On the Internet, you can find a lot of information on how to opt out of life insurance for a car loan. If a citizen is firmly confident in his material capabilities and is convinced that he does not need such a service, he has every right to refuse insurance. To do this, you need to fill out the appropriate application form to the bank. After that, the manager will consider it and make a decision.

You need to be ready to refuse to issue a loan or a loan on less favorable terms with higher interest rates. Thus, car insurance insurance in practice is not an additional cost for the client, but, on the contrary, serves as the basis for reducing the cost of the loan. This is a common practice in banking. The financial institution raises the rate when the risk increases and lowers it when the threats of non-payment diminish.

The cost of the policy for a car loan

The amount of premiums for life insurance for car loans depends on the size of the loan. However, as a rule, it is no more than 0.1%.

At the same time, both parties to the transaction: both the bank and the borrower will remain in the black. The first will receive compensation in the amount of the outstanding loan balance, the second will remain the full owner of the car.

How does customer protection work?

Suppose that an insured event occurs, as a result of which the citizen has lost his health and, as a result, will not be able to fulfill his professional duties, receive income and pay off the loan debt. In this case, the insurance organization pays the bank the remaining amount of the debt under the loan agreement, protecting the interests of its client. In this case, the vehicle taken on credit remains in the possession of the borrower.

Final Words

Life and health insurance for a car loan is not a prerequisite. However, this service should not be neglected, because it is beneficial not only to the bank, but also to the borrower. Having such insurance on hand, you can count on a positive answer to the issuance of a loan, on the one hand, on the other hand, it will serve as reliable protection for the payment of all financial obligations to the bank. By purchasing a life insurance program, you maintain your financial independence and stability.

entry.title: Two Easiest Ways to Transfer WhatsApp Conversations to Another Phone
entry.summary: If you just log in to an existing WhatsApp account on a new device, the history from the old device will not load. Now you will learn 2 ways to…
entry.content:
If you just log in to an existing WhatsApp account on a new device, the history from the old device will not load. Now you will learn 2 ways to solve this problem and continue communication from exactly where you left off, without unnecessary difficulties.

Option 1: Using Google Drive

WhatsApp has the ability to make a copy and save it to Google Drive. This feature is ideal for transferring chats to your new device:

  1. Before you "move" to a new phone, open the WhatsApp application, and tap on the three dots icon.
  2. Go to Settings> Conversations> Chat Backup.
  3. In the next window, you can manually select individual chats or configure the creation of a backup copy of conversations automatically at any frequency. Now when you install this application on your new smartphone, the messenger will offer to “get” chats and files from Google Drive.

This is the most convenient and fastest way to transfer correspondence to another phone.

Option 2: Create a copy of chats manually

For those who do not use Google Drive, a different method is suitable:

  1. Settings> Chats & Calls> Copy Chats.
  2. Save a copy to a memory card if your smartphone supports it.
  3. Take out the SD card, insert it into the prepared smartphone, restore chats.

What to do for smartphone users without a memory card:

  1. Take a USB cable and connect your device to your PC / laptop.
  2. Find the WhatsApp / Database smartphone folder on your PC or laptop. A previously saved copy is located here. The searched file looks something like this: "msgstore-2020-04-28.db.crypt".
  3. Transfer the file with the required data to your computer to any convenient folder.
  4. Now install WhatsApp, but don't open the app!
  5. Connect a new smartphone to a PC or laptop via a USB cable. The WhatsApp / Databases directory should have appeared already. If not, create the folder yourself.
  6. Transfer the file with the backup copy of your chats to it.
  7. Only now can WhatsApp be launched.
  8. The screen should display a message stating that a copy of the chats was found - click "Restore".

After a couple of seconds, the chat history will be loaded on the new smartphone.

entry.title: Running out of disk space? where is the best place to store photos, films, and programs
entry.summary: Each of us is once faced with the fact that the hard disk space is running out, you need to store them somewhere. It is also better not to fill…
entry.content:
Each of us is once faced with the fact that the hard disk space is running out, you need to store them somewhere. It is also better not to fill the hard disk so that the system does not slow down.

In general, there are 3 options for storing files: burn to DVDs, store in the cloud, or purchase an external hard drive.

I will say right away: you should not save the distributions of the programs, because the programs are changing, updated and it is better to download them again from the Internet. Now the time has passed when the programs were stored for several years.

Let's look at each case

1. Burning to DVD is a cheap option, but inconvenient because when you need something, you will need to search for a disc. Also, the disc is easily damaged and scratched, so the reliability is not very good here. The good thing about this method is that it is very inexpensive. And perhaps that's all.

2. Store in the cloud. Many cloud services give you disk space for a price. There are two disadvantages here: a constant subscription fee, as well as the risk that the disk on the server will simply burn out.

And in the contract for such services, it is written in black and white that the organization is not responsible for failures in work. And of course, you need a powerful Internet channel to upload and download your wealth, and your account can be broken and all your files can become public. In the cloud, I store those files that I need constant access from different devices. It is very convenient!

3. The best way is an external HDD hard drive. In my opinion, the most reliable. How to choose it? There are two factors here: capacity and reviews. I always choose according to reviews and try to take those models that have already received the proper number of ratings from real users (I don't make new models, I take from a year).

You should not buy a 2 terabyte disk at once, it is better to buy two disks per terabyte or 500 gigabytes each. One to use as a backup. After all, the more places where information will be recorded, the more likely it will be saved. The external drive is easily connected via USB, and in the "This PC" section it appears as a regular hard drive.

entry.title: How to connect AirPods to Android
entry.summary: Almost every person uses wireless headphones now, as it is convenient. For example, without additional cables, you can listen to music or podcasts while walking, cycling, or just jogging. Headsets…
entry.content:
Almost every person uses wireless headphones now, as it is convenient. For example, without additional cables, you can listen to music or podcasts while walking, cycling, or just jogging. Headsets from various manufacturers are available for sale, but AirPods are the most popular. Because the manufacturer of these headphones is Apple, many people have an understandable question: how to connect AirPods to Android. It's very simple, you don't even have to install additional applications and perform complex actions!

How to connect AirPods to Android phones?

It is necessary to make a reservation that AirPods are ordinary wireless headphones that connect to a device via Bluetooth. And here it doesn't matter what operating system is installed on your smartphone or tablet. So it is possible to pair the Apple headset with an Android phone and through the standard settings options. We have compiled step-by-step instructions, so we recommend that you familiarize yourself with it:

  1. Open the smart phone settings.
  2. Go to the "Bluetooth" section and move the slider to the right next to the corresponding item. You can also activate the option through the quick access shutter by opening it, and then clicking on the icon with the logo of the desired mode.
  3. We open the case where the AirPods themselves are located. Note that before starting pairing, the headphones must be returned to the case if you removed them from there before. 
  4. On the back of the case, we find an almost invisible button. It is easy to feel it. We hold it down, and then we wait a few seconds until the white or green indicator lights up. It all depends on what generation your headset is.
  5. We return to the phone, or rather to the "Bluetooth" tab. Refreshing the page and see that the name of Apple headphones has appeared on the list with available devices. Click on it to perform pairing. If the connection is made for the first time, then in the window that appears, you will need to select "Accept".

And that's it, now you can listen to music through AirPods connected to your Android smartphone. Here the principle of action is standard - click on the desired track and adjust the volume. You can also chat on the phone, record voice messages, and use other features of the wireless headset. But several nuances should be paid attention to.

Features of using AirPods with Android

As you know, AirPods are primarily designed for Apple smartphones, so Android phone owners may face certain restrictions. Firstly, the Siri voice assistant will be completely inaccessible, but you can use the rest of the assistants, but only after additional configuration.

Secondly, if you take the earpiece out of your ear, the melody will continue to play. To stop a track, you need to manually open the player on your smartphone, and then press the pause button. But this flaw can be fixed by installing the AndroPods app. It allows you to customize the wireless headset in detail, including turning on the display of the charge in the status bar and activating some gestures.

So, we took a quick look at how to connect AirPods to Android correctly. As practice shows, it is almost always possible to pair with headphones the first time. If you still have additional questions, then ask them in the comments. We will try to answer them and help you solve the problem!

entry.title: How to enable Miracast on Android
entry.summary: Smartphones are not made for only make calls but You can install almost any application for study or work on a smartphone, as well as a messenger or client of…
entry.content:
Smartphones are not made for only make calls but You can install almost any application for study or work on a smartphone, as well as a messenger or client of a popular social network. Moreover, such devices perfectly replace a computer, allowing you to watch videos or movies. It's just that it's extremely inconvenient to do this on a small screen, so many people connect their phone via Wi-Fi to a TV. Let's see how to enable Miracast on Android and display the image and videos from the smartphone screen to a SmartTV.

What is streaming on Android?

Previously, to connect a smartphone to a TV, you had to use an HDMI cable, which caused certain inconveniences. For example, the cord could be damaged, and the device must have been at a close distance to the monitor. But a few years ago, third-party developers introduced technology for remote transmission of information, called Miracast.

For this option to work, the TV and the phone must be connected to the same Wi-Fi network. There are no more restrictions. After activating the mode, it will be possible to display the image and videos from the smartphone on the TV screen or another monitor. That is, you can watch TV shows or play games on the large display.

How to enable Miracast on Android?

So, in this section, we proceed to its activation on the smartphone. Note that the broadcast is only available to users of smartphones with Android 4.2 and higher. Unfortunately, outdated phones do not allow image and video transmission to the TV screen. So, if you have an updated smartphone, you can enable Miracast, follow these steps:

  • Open the settings.
  • Go to the "Connection and Sharing" section.
  • Go to the "Broadcast" tab.
  • Next to the item "Broadcast", move the slider to the right to activate the mode.
  • Now turn on Wi-Fi on the TV and go to the menu with a connection to the phone. If you having difficulty finding this option, comment bellow your SmartTv Model and manufacturer name I will suggest the ways of option, or I also recommend that you read the manufacturer's instructions.
  • Find the TV model in the list on the smartphone and click on it.
  • Wait for the smartphone to connect to the TV.

You can also use the "Wireless Display" option. It practically does not differ from the previous version and allows you to display the image from the phone to a computer monitor or TV. Here's how to enable it in the settings:

  • Open the "Connection and Sharing" tab.
  • Go to the "Wireless Display" section.
  • Next to the item of the same name, move the slider to the right.
  • In the list, we find the model of your TV or monitor and connect.

And if your phone cannot start screen broadcasting through the settings, then you can install the Miracast application from the Play Store. After the installation is complete, open the utility, click on the "Connect" button and select the name of the TV or monitor from the list.

So now you know how to enable Miracast on Android. All options and control can be found in the settings of the smartphone, so there shouldn't be any problems. And if you still have questions, be sure to write them in the comments. We will try to answer them and help you!
